title: Japanese bamboo shoot rice dish
directions: Begin by washing the rice. Place the washed rice in your rice cooker, and pour in the milk until it comes up to the four-cup line on your cooker’s measurements.
Open up all boxes of Takenoko No Sato and add to the rice cooker.
Close the lid, push “Cook”, and let the cooker work its magic.
ingredients: Milk (see recipe for measurements, but one carton is more than enough)
